title: Why am im playing against silver 3 golds and plats and daimonds  and im bronze 2

body: before the alst 2 games i hard a  9 win streak but im bronze 2 am im worth silver level? im scared of playing rank

replies.body:
From looking into your question, there are a few different things to keep in mind:  First, you are matched by your MMR, not necessarily your division/tier.  Therefore, if your MMR is close to that of a Silver 3 player (or even Gold and higher), it is possible for you to place into a match against them even though you are in Bronze 2.  This would also mean you would be winning LP at huge margins pushing you to rise through the ranks very quickly.

Secondly, data and information from places like lolking are not always 100% accurate.  It is possible that some of the players you are playing against really also are Bronze and Silver, but not much much higher. I looked up your recent ranked matches, and you did fight against all Bronze and Silver players.

However, I did see you are playing some normal games as well.  Normal games use a completely different MMR than Ranked.  Therefore, if a Diamond Level player who never played a lot of normal games suddenly started playing normals, it is possible that he would be in a normal match with you given your normal MMR is very low still.

I hope this helps explain things a bit!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
